Dialogue.Page: Mod: NomaiVR Authors: Raicuparta and Artum

This mod allows Outer Wilds to be played using a VR headset, even remapping inputs to allow the use of VR controllers, permitting players to interact with the world of Outer Wilds with their own hands.
While certainly a technical achievement, the main merit of this mod is how it allows players of the game to experience in a whole new way, fully appreciating the scale and scenery of the game.
